long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There isn’t much time. Can you destroy all of the bricks in this electrifying version of the classic arcade game before the clock runs down to zero? Take control of the paddle and collect awesome power-ups while you play.
